modName: Magic or items left and right hand fix
summary: Mod for assign magic or item to left/righ hand.
descriptionHtml:
1. Swaps hands/mouse buttons (Yeah, dual-hand firethrower!)
2. Swaps Alt and Shift (I prefer to run by holding Shift)
3. Assigns Shout to the Middle mouse button (my pinky hurts when I press \'Z\')
4. Assigns \'C\' to the \'View\' action in the Inventory (dubbed by Scroll-up/down)
5. Assigns \'[\' and \']\' and also \',\' and \'.\' to the Left/right hand assignment (may be useful for some people) 



Unpack to you game directory.
reset you controls to default
Make sure you dont have \"ControlMap_Custom\" in SKYRIM directory!




created by eliotcougar.
author: eliotcougar
